description: Reported data should align with the bank's financial spreading systems and credit policy.
condition: Values should be derived from the bank's financial spreading systems and in accordance with its credit policy.

description: Financial statement data should be the most recent available as of the report date.
condition: Values should reflect the most recent financial data found in the consolidated holding company’s financial spreading system as of the report date.

description: Fields 54, 56, 57, 58, 59, and 82 should be reported for the most recently available trailing twelve month (TTM) period.
condition: Data should reflect the TTM period, with the ending date indicated in Field 52 (DateFinancials).

description: If an obligor lacks trailing twelve months of financial information sufficient for Fields 54, 56, 57, 58, 59, and 82, provide the underwritten annual information.
condition: If TTM data is unavailable, underwritten annual information should be used, with the ending date indicated in Field 52 (DateFinancials).

description: Fields 55 and 60 should be reported for the TTM period ended one year prior to the date indicated in Field 52.
condition: Data should reflect the TTM period ended one year prior to the date indicated in Field 52 (DateFinancials).

description: If an obligor lacks trailing twelve months of financial information sufficient for Fields 55 and 60, provide the underwritten annual information.
condition: If TTM data is unavailable, underwritten annual information should be used, with the ending date one year prior to the date indicated in Field 52 (DateFinancials).
